item.description:
Angie D'Anjou
603 912-5633
Rising Full Moon Intention Gathering at the Beach 7:00pm
Tuesday, Aug 24th (rain date Wed. Aug 25)
Location: Hampton Beach, meet behind the half shell stage
across from the Hampton Casino Ballroom.
Visit www.crystaljademetaphysical.com for details.

Soak in the late Summer Full Moon Energy as we form an
intention circle on the beach front during the rising of the
Full Moon. Please feel free to bring blankets, beach chairs,
drums, or other instruments if you wish.
Angie D'Anjou will open the ceremony with a brief spritually
channeled message for all to share. This is a Free Gathering,
however donations will be accepted. Thank you.
Full Sturgeon Moon â€“ August The fishing tribes are given credit
for the naming of this Moon, since sturgeon, a large fish of
the Great Lakes and other major bodies of water, were most
readily caught during this month. A few tribes knew it as the
Full Red Moon because, as the Moon rises, it appears reddish
through any sultry haze. It was also called the Green Corn Moon
or Grain Moon.
Place: Hampton Beach, NH behind the half shell outdoor stage.
item.name: Rising Full Moon Intention Gathering at the Beach
